title: Pilates for your body and mind
description: A trained and experienced physiotherapist, I specialise in Pilates exercises for building core muscles.

features.title: Pregnancy and post-natal Pilates
features.description: I have developed exercise routines specifically aimed at pregnant women and new mothers.

features.title: Pain Management
features.description: Pilates can help with joint pain, chronic pain, Fibromyalgia, and sports injury.

features.title: Stress management
features.description: The focus and percision of movement can help with stress through relaxation and meditation.
